alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 8:22PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Aiken County through 900 PM EDT... At 822 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gloverville, or near Aiken Mall, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Clearwater, Aiken Mall, New Ellenton, Jackson, Gloverville, Burnettown, Audubon`s Silver Bluff Sanctuary, Savannah River Site Badge Office, Redcliffe Plantation State Historic Site, Boyd Pond Park, New Savannah Bluff Lock & Dam Park, and Beech Island. This includes Interstate 520 in South Carolina near mile marker 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
